content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by David Tennant

{| class=infobox style="width:22em; text-align:left; font-size:90%; vertical-align:middle; background-color:#white;"
|-
|+ David Tennant awards and nominations
|-
| colspan="3" style="text-align:center;" |
|-
| colspan=3|
|- style="background-color#d9e8ff"
|
| colspan=2 width=50
|-
|
| colspan=2 width=50
|-
|
| colspan=2 width 50
|}
